# ConnectIn Backend Dependencies
# ===============================================
#
# This file was generated or updated on 2025-04-08.
# Use 'pip install -r requirements.txt' to install dependencies.
# Important: Versions are pinned; do not modify them without thorough testing.

# --- Core Web Framework & API ---
fastapi==0.100.1                # Core framework for building APIs
starlette==0.27.0               # ASGI framework (dependency of FastAPI)
python-multipart==0.0.20        # Form/file handling in FastAPI

# --- ASGI Servers & Deployment ---
uvicorn==0.23.1                 # ASGI server, ideal for FastAPI
gunicorn==23.0.0                # WSGI server (can be used with Uvicorn workers)
hypercorn==0.17.3               # Alternative ASGI server

# --- Async & Networking ---
anyio==4.8.0                    # Core async I/O library for FastAPI/HTTPX
async-timeout==5.0.1            # Utility for async timeouts
aiofiles==24.1.0                # Asynchronous file handling
aiohappyeyeballs==2.6.1         # Connection establishment utility
aiohttp==3.11.16                # Async HTTP client/server
aioitertools==0.12.0            # Async equivalents of itertools
aiosignal==1.3.2                # Async signal management
attrs==25.3.0                   # Dependency for aiohttp and others
eventlet==0.39.0                # Concurrency library (often used with Celery)
exceptiongroup==1.2.2           # Dependency for anyio
frozenlist==1.5.0               # Dependency for aiohttp
greenlet==3.1.1                 # Low-level coroutines (dependency for eventlet/SQLAlchemy async)
h11==0.14.0                     # HTTP/1.1 implementation
h2==4.2.0                       # HTTP/2 implementation
hpack==4.1.0                    # Dependency for h2
httpcore==0.17.3                # Low-level async HTTP client/server (base for HTTPX)
httptools==0.6.4                # Fast HTTP parser
hyperframe==6.1.0               # Dependency for h2
multidict==6.3.2                # Dependency for aiohttp/yarl
priority==2.0.0                 # Dependency for h2
sniffio==1.3.1                  # Detects current async library
urllib3==1.26.20                # HTTP client (base for requests, boto)
uvloop==0.21.0                  # Fast asyncio event loop (optional but recommended)
websockets==15.0                # WebSocket library
wsproto==1.2.0                  # WebSocket protocol (dependency)
yarl==1.18.3                    # URL utility (dependency for aiohttp)

# --- Database ---
#   --- ORM & PostgreSQL ---
sqlalchemy==2.0.38              # Core ORM
psycopg2-binary==2.9.7          # PostgreSQL driver (binary version)
#   --- NoSQL (MongoDB) ---
mongoengine==0.29.1             # ODM for MongoDB (Note: Confirm if used alongside PostgreSQL)
pymongo==4.11.1                 # MongoDB driver
#   --- Caching (Redis) ---
redis==4.6.0                    # Synchronous Redis client
aioredis==2.0.1                 # Asynchronous Redis client
#   --- Search (Elasticsearch) ---
elasticsearch==8.17.1           # Elasticsearch client
elastic-transport==8.17.0       # Transport for Elasticsearch client
#   --- Migrations ---
alembic==1.14.1                 # Database migration tool
mako==1.3.9                     # Templating engine for Alembic

# --- Task Queues & Messaging ---
celery==5.3.0                   # Distributed task queue system
kombu==5.4.2                    # Messaging library for Celery
amqp==5.3.1                     # AMQP protocol (for RabbitMQ/Redis as Celery brokers)
billiard==4.2.1                 # Fork of multiprocessing for Celery
vine==5.1.0                     # Dependency for Celery/Kombu

# --- Authentication & Security ---
authlib==1.4.1                  # OAuth, OpenID Connect, JWT, etc.
bcrypt==4.2.1                   # Password hashing
cryptography==44.0.1            # Cryptographic primitives
ecdsa==0.19.0                   # ECDSA algorithm (dependency)
passlib==1.7.4                  # Password hashing schemes (includes bcrypt)
python-jose==3.3.0              # JOSE implementation (JWT, JWS, JWE)
rsa==4.9                        # RSA algorithm (dependency)
pyasn1==0.6.1                   # Dependency for cryptography

# --- Data Validation & Settings ---
pydantic==2.10.6                # Data validation and parsing
pydantic-settings==2.7.1        # Settings management with Pydantic
pydantic_core==2.27.2           # Core of Pydantic V2
annotated-types==0.7.0          # Dependency for Pydantic
email_validator==2.2.0          # Email address validation

# --- AI / External APIs ---
openai==1.70.0                  # Client for OpenAI API (e.g., ChatGPT)

# --- Cloud / AWS ---
boto3==1.37.1                   # AWS SDK for Python (synchronous)
botocore==1.37.1                # Low-level core for boto3/aioboto3
aioboto3==14.1.0                # Asynchronous AWS SDK
aiobotocore==2.21.1             # Async core for aioboto3
s3transfer==0.11.3              # File transfer utility for S3 (dependency for boto3)
jmespath==1.0.1                 # JSON query language (dependency for botocore)

# --- Development & Testing ---
pytest==7.4.2                   # Testing framework
pluggy==1.5.0                   # Plugin system for pytest
iniconfig==2.0.0                # INI file parser for pytest
watchfiles==1.0.4               # File change tracking (for --reload)
click==8.1.8                    # CLI creation (dependency for Alembic, Celery)
click-didyoumean==0.3.1         # Click extension
click-plugins==1.1.1            # Click extension
click-repl==0.3.0               # Click extension
prompt_toolkit==3.0.50          # Interactive CLI creation (dependency for click-repl)
wcwidth==0.2.13                 # Terminal character width detection (dependency)
tqdm==4.67.1                    # Progress bars (typically for scripts/ML)

# --- Utilities ---
#   --- General ---
python-dateutil==2.9.0.post0    # Extended date/time utilities
typing_extensions==4.12.2       # Additional Python type hints
tzdata==2025.1                  # Timezone database
blinker==1.9.0                  # Signal/event library
deprecated==1.2.18              # Decorator for marking deprecated code
packaging==24.2                 # Package handling utilities
six==1.17.0                     # Python 2/3 compatibility (may not be needed for pure Python 3)
wrapt==1.17.2                   # Decorator and wrapper utilities
propcache==0.3.1                # Property caching
distro==1.9.0                   # Linux distribution detection
jiter==0.9.0                    # Fast JSON iterator
#   --- HTTP Clients ---
requests==2.32.3                # Synchronous HTTP client
httpx==0.24.1                   # Asynchronous HTTP client
#   --- Configuration ---
python-dotenv==1.0.1            # Load environment variables from .env files
pyyaml==6.0.2                   # YAML file handling
tomli==2.2.1                    # TOML file parser
#   --- Media ---
pillow==11.1.0                  # Image processing
weasyprint==65.0                # HTML/CSS to PDF conversion
pyphen==0.17.2                  # Hyphenation (dependency for weasyprint)
brotli==1.1.0                   # Compression (dependency for weasyprint)
cssselect2==0.8.0               # CSS selectors (dependency for weasyprint)
fonttools==4.57.0               # Font utilities (dependency for weasyprint)
pydyf==0.11.0                   # PDF generation (dependency for weasyprint)
tinycss2==1.4.0                 # CSS parsing (dependency for weasyprint)
tinyhtml5==2.0.0                # HTML5 parsing (dependency for weasyprint)
webencodings==0.5.1             # Character encodings (dependency for weasyprint)
zopfli==0.2.3.post1             # Compression (dependency for weasyprint)
#   --- Templating/Markup ---
markupsafe==3.0.2               # Safe HTML/XML string handling (dependency for Jinja2/Mako)
markdown==3.7                   # Markdown to HTML conversion
#   --- Other/Low-Level ---
certifi==2025.1.31              # Root SSL certificates
cffi==1.17.1                    # C code interface (dependency for cryptography)
charset-normalizer==3.4.1       # Charset detection (dependency for requests)
dnspython==2.7.0                # DNS utilities (dependency for email_validator)
idna==3.10                      # Internationalized domain name support (dependency)
pycparser==2.22                 # C code parser (dependency for cffi)
limits==4.0.1                   # Rate limiting implementation
slowapi==0.1.9                  # Rate limiting for FastAPI/Starlette

# --- DevOps / Infrastructure ---
docker==7.1.0                   # Python SDK for Docker API
